author: Leigh Beadon
description: It’s that time again! Instead of our usual look at the top comments of the week, it’s time to celebrate the most highly voted comments of the year at Techdirt. As usual we’ll be looking at the top three winners in the Insightful and Funny categories, as well as some outliers that rose to the […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of 2025 At Techdirt
